title: Max Verstappen can race Nürburgring 24 Hours after Nordschleife debut
summary: Max Verstappen has earned the licence that will allow him to race at the Nürburgring 24 Hours, and could compete in the 2026 running of the historic race

qa_pairs.question: What is the Nürburgring 24 Hours?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: A 24-hour endurance race held at the Nürburgring circuit in Germany.
wrong_options: A Formula 1 Grand Prix held at the Nürburgring.
A motorcycle racing event at the Nürburgring.
A rally event in the Nürburgring area.

qa_pairs.question: Which driver recently earned a licence to compete in the Nürburgring 24 Hours?
In which year could Max Verstappen potentially compete in the Nürburgring 24 Hours?
